mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, tel, profile_img, birthday, gender, is_admin, salt) values(#{user.userId}, #{user.userPw}, #{user.userName}, #{user.email}, #{user.tel}, #{user.profileImg.saveFile}, #{user.birthday}, #{user.gender} , #{user.isAdmin}, #{salt})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, is_admin from user where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw}
select salt from user where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from user where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw}
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel}, profile_img=#{profileImg.saveFile}, birthday=#{birthday}, gender=#{gender} where user_id=#{userId}
